CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( PaymentStatus__c, "Paid" ) = true, IMAGE( "/resource/InvoicePaidStatus/Pago.png", "Pago", 18, 18 ) & " Pago", IF( ISPICKVAL( PaymentStatus__c, "Unpaid" ) = true, IMAGE( "/resource/InvoicePaidStatus/Naopago.png", "Naopago", 18, 18 ) & " Não Pago", null ) )
CustomField.label: Status do Pagamento
